sources.title: Beast of the Yellow Night (1971) EDDIE ROMERO
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: John Ashley, Mary Charlotte Wilcox, Leopoldo Salcedo
Director: Eddie Romero

At the end of WWII,  an army deserter strikes up a hellish bargain with a mysterious stranger. 

TRIVIA: Weird Filipino horror from the director of MAD DOCTOR OF BLOOD ISLAND, TWILIGHT PEOPLE, and BEYOND ATLANTIS.

metadata.Plot: Satan saves a man from death on condition he become his disciple (and, as it turns out, a hairy murderous beast).
metadata.Actors: John Ashley, Mary Wilcox, Leopoldo Salcedo
